animeTitle: Esper Mami: Hoshizora no Dancing Doll
otherNames: Mami the ESPer: Dancing Dolls in a Starry Sky, エスパー魔美 星空のダンシングドール
synopsis: Schoolgirl Mami Sakura discovers that she has superpowers. She can sense other people in trouble and teleport to help them, but she keeps her secret double-life hidden from her parents with the help of her schoolfriend, Kazuo Takahata. In this short film, Mami uses her powers to make a puppet show for deprived children.
